.NET Core 教學課程 (工具 Preview 4)
.NET Core 教學課程 (工具 Preview 4)

trans-unit.source: This topic applies to Visual Studio 2017 RC - .NET Core Tools Preview 4.
trans-unit.target: 此主題適用於 Visual Studio 2017 RC - .NET Core 工具 Preview 4。

trans-unit.source: For the .NET Core Tools Preview 2 version, see the [.NET Core Tutorials](../../tutorials/index.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 工具 Preview 2 版本，請參閱 [.NET Core 教學課程](../../tutorials/index.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: The following tutorials are available for learning about .NET Core using Preview 4 of the tooling.
trans-unit.target: 下列教學課程可供學習有關使用工具 Preview 4 的 .NET Core。

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on Windows/Linux/macOS using the command line (SDK Preview 4)](using-with-xplat-cli-msbuild.md)
trans-unit.target: [使用命令列在 Windows/Linux/macOS 上開始使用 .NET Core (SDK Preview 4)](using-with-xplat-cli-msbuild.md)

trans-unit.source: [Organizing and testing projects with the .NET Core command line (SDK Preview 4)](using-with-xplat-cli-msbuild-folders.md)
trans-unit.target: [使用 .NET Core 命令列組織和測試專案 (SDK Preview 4)](using-with-xplat-cli-msbuild-folders.md)

trans-unit.source: [Getting started with .NET Core on Windows, using Visual Studio 2017](using-on-windows-vs-2017.md)
trans-unit.target: [使用 Visual Studio 2017 在 Windows 上開始使用 .NET Core](using-on-windows-vs-2017.md)

trans-unit.source: [Building a complete .NET Core solution on Windows, using Visual Studio 2017](using-on-windows-vs-2017-full-solution.md)
trans-unit.target: [使用 Visual Studio 2017 在 Windows 上建置完整的 .NET Core 解決方案](using-on-windows-vs-2017-full-solution.md)

trans-unit.source: For tutorials about developing ASP.NET Core web applications, see the [ASP.NET Core documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/core/).
trans-unit.target: 如需開發 ASP.NET Core Web 應用程式的教學課程，請參閱 [ASP.NET Core 文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/core/)。
